title: Boston Red Sox average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, and finally slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 54.79 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 52.32 was reached at Year 2014
min_summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, and finally slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016.
